description: This file is a Python script that sets up and uses a FirecrawlReader to scrape or crawl documents from a specified URL, handling environment variables, and printing document details or errors.

classes.name: FirecrawlReader
classes.description: A class responsible for reading and scraping documents from a specified source, likely implementing methods for crawling and scraping content.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Method of FirecrawlReader that retrieves documents from a given URL based on configured parameters.
